title: Inside Labour's bid to install Corbyn in Number 10 using social media
text:
As another General Election looms, the battle for No10 will fundamentally be fought and won online. In a four-part special series, we will investigate the tactics and dark arts being used by all of the parties to shape the outcome. Today's Part 2 looks at how Momentum and Labour are using social media in a bid to install Jeremy Corbyn in No10.

As the clock struck 10pm on a warm summer’s evening in 2017, Britain’s political elite were left reeling. The exit poll for a General Election called by the then Prime Minister Theresa May hinted at a cull for the Conservatives in what was meant to be a clean sweep.

The resulting hung parliament, which put the Tories in a pact with the Democratic Unionist...
description: As another General Election looms, the battle for No10 will fundamentally be fought and won online.
